definition[0]: to recognize and correctly name someone or something
example[0]: He was too far away to be able to identify faces.
example[1]: The police took fingerprints and identified the body.
example[2]: Eyewitnesses identified the gunman as an army sergeant.
example[3]: The aircraft were identified as American.
definition[1]: to recognize something or discover exactly what it is, what its nature or origin is etc
example[4]: Scientists have identified the gene that causes abnormal growth.
example[5]: They identified a number of problem areas.
definition[2]: if a particular thing identifies someone or something, it makes them easy to recognize
example[6]: His accent identified him as a Frenchman.
